## Datasource.init() method

Initializes the datasource with the given options and fetches metadata if specified.

**Signature:**

```typescript
init(options: DatasourceOptions, fetchMeta?: boolean, startStream?: boolean): Promise<boolean>;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

options


</td><td>

[DatasourceOptions](./foundation-comms.datasourceoptions.md)


</td><td>

The options to initialize the datasource with.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

fetchMeta


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional flag to fetch metadata for the datasource. Defaults to true.


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

startStream


</td><td>

boolean


</td><td>

_(Optional)_ Optional flag to start the data stream. Defaults to true.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;

A promise that resolves with a boolean indicating whether the initialization was successful.
